title: High-temperature superconductivity in iron-based materials
title_cn: 铁基材料中的高温超导性
abstract: The surprising discovery of superconductivity in layered iron-based materials, with transition temperatures climbing as high as 55 K, has led to thousands of publications on this subject over the past two years. Although there is general consensus on the unconventional nature of the Cooper pairing state of these systems, several central questions remain — including the role of magnetism, the nature of chemical and structural tuning, and the resultant pairing symmetry — and the search for universal properties and principles continues. Here we review the progress of research on iron-based superconducting materials, highlighting the main experimental benchmarks that have been reached so far and the important questions that remain to be conclusively answered.
abstract_cn: 在层状铁基材料中超导性的令人惊讶的发现，其转变温度高达55℃，在过去的两年中，已经有数千本关于该主题的出版物。 尽管对于这些系统的Cooper配对状态的非常规性质已经达成了普遍共识，但仍存在一些核心问题。 包括磁性的作用，化学和结构调整的性质，以及由此产生的配对对称性＆＃8212; 并继续寻求通用的特性和原理。 在这里，我们回顾了铁基超导材料的研究进展，重点介绍了迄今为止已达到的主要实验基准以及仍有待最终回答的重要问题。

title: Universal resistances of the quantum resistance–capacitance circuit
title_cn: 量子电阻电容电路的通用电阻
abstract: Mesoscopic circuits cooled down to low temperatures witness marked non-local effects in their transport properties because of electron coherence—electron wavefunctions spread over the sample and correlate its different parts. One of the consequences is that, in one dimension, the maximum d.c. conductance is quantized in steps of e2/h. Here we extend the concept of ‘universal quantized resistance’ to the a.c. regime. We analyse the coherent quantum resistance–capacitance circuit comprising a cavity capacitively coupled to a gate and connected by means of a single spin-polarized channel to a reservoir lead. We show that, as a result of the Coulomb interaction and global phase coherence, the charge relaxation resistance Rq is identical for weak and large transmissions and that it smoothly changes from h/2e2 to h/e2 when the frequency exceeds the level spacing of the cavity. For large cavities, we relate the resistance h/e2 to the Korringa–Shiba relation of the Kondo model. Finally, we introduce a larger class of models with a universal charge relaxation resistance.
abstract_cn: 冷却到低温的介观电路由于电子相干性在整个样品上散布并关联了其不同部分，因此在传输性能方面表现出明显的非局部效应。结果之一是，在一维中，最大d.c。电导以e <sup> 2 </ sup> / h的步长进行量化。在这里，我们扩展了“通用量化电阻”的概念。到交流政权。我们分析了相干量子电阻电容电路，该电路包括一个容性耦合到栅极并通过单个自旋极化通道连接到储层引线的腔。我们表明，由于库仑相互作用和整体相位相干性，弱和大传输的电荷弛豫电阻R <sub> q </ sub>相同，并且从h / 2e <sup> 2 < / sup>到h / e <sup> 2 </ sup>当频率超过腔的水平间距时。对于大空腔，我们将电阻h / e <sup> 2 </ sup>与Kondo模型的Korringa＆＃8211; Shiba关系相关。最后，我们介绍一类具有通用电荷弛豫抵抗力的模型。</ p>

title: Interplay of quantum criticality and geometric frustration in columbite
title_cn: 哥伦比亚量子临界与几何受挫的相互作用
abstract: CoNb2O6 is a material with remarkable properties that are determined by an exciting interplay of quantum mechanics and geometric frustration. On the one hand, weakly coupled ferromagnetic Ising chains of Co2+ ions can be tuned by an applied magnetic field through a quantum critical point to be paramagnetic; on the other hand, the Ising chains must contend with residual interactions on a frustrated triangular lattice in their choice of how to order. Motivated by the material, we theoretically study the phase diagram of quantum ferromagnetic Ising chains coupled antiferromagnetically on a triangular lattice in the plane perpendicular to the chain direction. We combine exact solutions of the quantum criticality in the isolated chains with perturbative approximations for the frustrated interchain couplings. When the triangular lattice has an isosceles distortion, which occurs in the real material, the phase diagram at absolute zero temperature is rich with five different states of matter: ferrimagnetic, Néel, antiferromagnetic, paramagnetic and incommensurate phases, separated by quantum phase transitions. Implications of our results on experiments in CoNb2O6 are discussed.
abstract_cn: CoNb 2 O 6 是一种具有非凡性能的材料，它由量子力学和几何挫折的激动相互作用决定。一方面，可以通过磁场通过量子临界点将Co 2 + 离子的弱耦合铁磁伊辛链调谐为顺磁性；另一方面，伊辛链在选择排序方式时必须与沮丧的三角形晶格上的残余相互作用相抗衡。受材料的驱使，我们在理论上研究了在垂直于链方向的平面上的三角晶格上反铁磁耦合的量子铁磁伊辛链的相图。我们将孤立链中的量子临界性的精确解与受挫的链间耦合的扰动近似相结合。当三角形晶格具有等腰线变形（发生在实际材料中）时，绝对零温度下的相图富含五种不同的物质状态：亚铁磁性，N＆el，反铁磁性，顺磁性和不相称的相，由量子隔开相变。讨论了我们的结果对CoNb 2 O 6 实验的意义。

title: Strong and tunable nonlinear optomechanical coupling in a low-loss system
title_cn: 低损耗系统中的强大且可调的非线性光机耦合
abstract: A major goal in optomechanics is to observe and control quantum behaviour in a system consisting of a mechanical resonator coupled to an optical cavity. Work towards this goal has focused on increasing the strength of the coupling between the mechanical and optical degrees of freedom. However, the form of this coupling is crucial in determining which phenomena can be observed in such a system. Here we demonstrate that avoided crossings in the spectrum of an optical cavity containing a flexible dielectric membrane enable us to realize several different forms of the optomechanical coupling. These include cavity detunings that are (to lowest order) linear, quadratic or quartic in the membrane’s displacement, and a cavity finesse that is linear in (or independent of) the membrane’s displacement. All these couplings are realized in a single device with extremely low optical loss and can be tuned over a wide range in situ. In particular, we find that the quadratic coupling can be increased three orders of magnitude beyond previous devices. As a result of these advances, the device presented here should be capable of demonstrating the quantization of the membrane’s mechanical energy.
abstract_cn: 光力学的主要目标是观察和控制系统中的量子行为，该系统由与光腔耦合的机械谐振器组成。朝着这个目标的努力集中在增加机械和光学自由度之间的耦合强度。但是，这种耦合的形式对于确定在这种系统中可以观察到哪些现象至关重要。在这里，我们证明了避免在包含柔性介电膜的光学腔的光谱中发生交叉，使我们能够实现几种不同形式的光机械耦合。这些包括在膜片位移中呈线性，二次或四次（最低阶）的腔失谐，以及在膜片位移呈线性（或独立于膜位移）的腔细度。所有这些耦合都是在单个设备中实现的，其光损耗极低，并且可以在很宽的范围内进行现场调谐。特别是，我们发现二次耦合可以比以前的设备增加三个数量级。由于这些进展，此处介绍的设备应该能够证明膜的机械能的量化。</ p>

title: Erratum: Crossover of the three-dimensional topological insulator Bi2Se3 to the two-dimensional limit
title_cn: 勘误表：三维拓扑绝缘体Bi2Se3越过二维极限
